dependencies.description: OpenCL (Open Computing Language) C header files
dependencies.name: opencl-c-headers

dependent_to.description:
This package aims at creating an Open Source alternative to vendor
specific OpenCL ICD loaders.
dependent_to.name: ocl-icd

dependent_to.description:
VirtualGL redirects 3D commands from a Unix/Linux OpenGL application
onto a server-side GPU and converts the rendered 3D images into a video
stream with which remote clients can interact to view and control the 3D
application in real time.
dependent_to.name: virtualgl

description: Bundled OpenCL (Open Computing Language) header files
name: opencl-headers

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
